Explored potential Claude CLI fallback mechanism to reduce user friction

suggestedTasks.title: Implement Claude CLI Fallback Configuration System
suggestedTasks.description:
Design a robust configuration system that allows seamless switching between Anthropic API key and Claude CLI for LLM interactions. Implement detection logic for CLI availability, create configuration interface for user preferences, and add error handling for fallback scenarios.

Target files: config/llm-config.js, services/api-service.js

Ensure the system can gracefully handle scenarios where neither API key nor CLI is available.
suggestedTasks.reason: Discovered potential user experience improvement during API key investigation

suggestedTasks.title: Document Claude API and CLI Integration Patterns
suggestedTasks.description:
Create comprehensive documentation explaining the new API key and CLI integration approaches. Include setup instructions, troubleshooting guidelines, and configuration examples for different usage scenarios.

Update README.md and create a new documentation file in docs/integrations/ detailing the implementation strategy and potential edge cases.
suggestedTasks.reason: Need clear guidance for users on new integration methods

gotchas: Ensure robust error handling for API and CLI interactions

documentationNeeds: Update README with new API/CLI integration details
